aws_dms_replication_subnet_group.description: Provides a DMS (Data Migration Service) subnet group resource.

replication_subnet_group_description.description: The description for the subnet group.

replication_subnet_group_id.description: The name for the replication subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string.

subnet_ids.description: A list of the EC2 subnet IDs for the subnet group.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC the subnet group is in.
